articles.title: American armed with handguns, stun gun quickly nabbed after illegally entering Canada: RCMP - CTV News Vancouver
articles.description: An American who illegally crossed the border into Canada while carrying various weapons late last month was quickly caught by police, according to the RCMP.
articles.content:
An American who illegally crossed the border into Canada while carrying various weapons late last month was quickly caught by police, according to the RCMP.
Mounties said John Wright, a U.S. citizen… [+1084 chars]

source.name: American Council on Science and Health

articles.title: The Clinical Trial That Should (But Probably Won't) Close The Book On Ivermectin - American Council on Science and Health
articles.description: The controversy surrounding ivermectin as a therapy for COVID has been longstanding and fierce. A recent paper in NEJM may or may not settle the ongoing debate. But the paper is full of data. Here is a condensed look at the key numbers.
articles.content: About a week ago, news outlets reported that a large randomized controlled trial showed that ivermectin had no impact on COVID. At that time, only scant data on which the conclusions were based were … [+5894 chars]

articles.title: MLSE's Larry Tanenbaum joins bid from Boston Celtics owner to buy soccer club Chelsea - CBC.ca
articles.description: American investor and Boston Celtics owner Stephen Pagliuca says Maple Leaf Sports and Entertainment chairman Larry Tanenbaum and former Chelsea captain John Terry have joined his bid to purchase the Premier League club.
